title: Can I get the ALLEN or Aakash books if I am not their student? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can. That's called DLP course - Distance learning program. Its of 2 types: Only Books (modules)Modules + TestsYou can get that at nearby center of Allen or Aakash or you can also call and take more info from the respective branch. Hope this is helpful If you find it helpful then upvote it
You can get their DLP if you want or you can buy it from the stationary stores of kota or you can get it on olx

Look its kind of easy But you need to spend some money Steps are as follows- 1.make friends with a allen student 2.borrow his/her book for a day 3.photocopy it 4.return it back 5.study very hard from the book and qualify jee AND ENJOY
